alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 12:59AM EST until February 19 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... French Creek At Meadville affecting Crawford County. For the French Creek...including Meadville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...French Creek At Meadville. * WHEN...From early this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding begins along Cussewago Creek near Race Street. Floodwater begins to affect residents in west Asbury Manor Moblie Home Park and Ellsworth Park near Cussewago Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 8.8 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.2 feet on 03/07/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning by 1100 AM EST.
